#summary Change Log

(28.11.2008) *keyla 0.1.4*
  * Now user can change layout using keyla while renaming a file on desktop ([http://code.google.com/p/keyla/issues/detail?id=1 Issue 1])
  
(23.11.2008) *keyla 0.1.3*
  * Internationalization support
  * English localization

(02.11.2008) *keyla 0.1.2*
  * Now it is possible to switch layout in the Command Prompt ([http://code.google.com/p/keyla/issues/detail?id=1 Issue 1])
  
(29.09.2008) *keyla 0.1.1*
  * Tray icon menu now contains an item to disable keyla
  
*keyla 0.1.0*
  * The initial version
